Review_Text: If anyone follows Damo they'll understand how much he and his music means to his fans. Love Yourself Today embodies this. It follows 3 of Damo's supporters and what his music means to them and how it has helped during the lowest of times. Every song makes you think, cry, shout, smile and most of all feel part of a special moment. Seen Damo live many times and each one is special.It shows how music can take you to another place when you are down.Please watch and think of other people and what they are going through. This is a heart warming documentary.Love Yourself Today My Friends.Thank You Damo.
